title: reply button doesn't work
body: I can't respond to riots support ticket because the "submit" button is all greyed out i've looked everywhere and found no alternative. I have to send LoL logs to them to fix my game.

replies.body: I can't reply to the ticket at all and I'm trying right now .-.
I have the same issue right now.

That's strange!  Are you using an [account recovery form](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416), or are you logged into the ticketing center?  You'll need to be logged into your account on that site to send the ticket.  Otherwise, you can hit us up directly as well via support@riotgames.com.
